I have to admit, this goes quite a distance even for a cursed tag like NTR. Can you even imagine the mental strain of cheating on your girlfriend with your own sister? Not to mention losing your mind in the process? I have to say, although this is still technically on the lighter side of cursed sauce, it’s pretty fucked up, even when changing your POV to any character. The sister, you’re some incestuous ball of yandere. The girlfriend, your ass is getting NTRed by an alpha fenale that just happens to be your own boyfriends sister. It’s just an overall unique story compared to the generic “I found this now suck my dick if you don’t want it to be exposed.”

How can you read this without dying inside? 
Also wtf is the sister's plan? She obviously doesn't want her brother's happiness, that's for sure. She thinks she can get her way by manipulating everyone, and this only works story-wise, because the author pretends that the brother isn't able to just beat her up and silence her forever, which he absolutely could do, that would be the only reasonable reaction to such amount of mental stress.
So remember, kids, don't blackmail your brother, cuz in real life he would murder you at some point, and then kill himself because he want's the pain you caused him to stop.
Agony leads to sadness, sadness leads to pain, pain leads to anger, anger leads to hate. Emotions make us do irrational things.

@Pentagram Industries it's not a nightmare. The whole story is real. Also girlfriend was forced to agree. Kokoro simply able to manipulate both brother and girlfriend as she has tools to blackmail them both (videos, child). Kokoro needs her brother's girlfriends (now wife) to cover her relationship with brother. Also by controlling brother's girlfriend she can now be sure that her brother won't be able to escape/betray her. Pregnancy made situation worse for brother and his gf.  Kokoro forced girlfriend not only to accept but also support her and brother's relationship and their kids. Now that her brother is married and has a child from Kokoro it's even easier for Kokoro to blackmail and manipulate and marriage is a benefit for her as girlfriend's family will support Kokoro, brother and Kokoro's kids without them knowing. Unfortunately girlfriend will be able only to watch them and be happy just by being next to the person she loves. Kokoro won't give her any other options.

Actually I guess the whole story is not a fantasy. It's real. Since sister and brother can't be together officially - KOKORO is using brother's girlfriend as cover for their true relationship by manipulating them both. All the wedding with Tomoka (no she's not his sister) is just for public. That's why even Tomoka said:" I wanted everyone to cheer on us for this but many will get the wrong idea about what is going on here". In the end of chapter 4 Tomoka has wedding ring and holding a baby. So chapter 4.5 is explanation of what happened between  the moment when Kokoro said "I'm pregnant" and the last few pages on chapter 4. So the baby in chapter 4 is indeed Kokoro's.  Kokoro's relationship with brother is a secret for public so everyone is thinking that it's Tomoka's baby. Just as planned by Kokoro. Why it's not Tomoko's baby? Kokoro says that Tomoka only has sex when her brother is using a condom. In chapter 3.5 you can see guy is using condom indeed. So I guess it's all clear now...
